## Logisim PLA program table
| Opcode | Saida | Instrução |
|--|--|--|
| 0000 | 000000000 | NOP |
| 0001 | 111100000 | STO |
| 0010 | 011111000 | LD |
| 0011 | 001110100 | LDI |
| 0100 | 011110010 | ADD |
| 0101 | 001110000 | ADDI |
| 0110 | 011110011 | SUB |
| 0111 | 001110001 | SUBI |


## Exemplo
E = 2*A-B+2*C+D

A = 21
B = 10
C = 32
D = 70

```
ADDI 21 0101000000010101 5015
ADDI 21 0101000000010101 5015
SUBI 10 0111000000001010 700A
ADDI 32 0101000000100000 5020
ADDI 32 0101000000100000 5020
ADDI 70 0101000001000110 5046
```
